ns0:DryadDataFile.ns2:title: Mauldin et al Microsatellite Data Dryad
ns0:DryadDataFile.ns2:description: This file contains all microsatellite data examined in the study. The first row contains column headers. The first column contains museum ID numbers. All following columns indicate allele sizes for the animal indicated at the beginning of the row. Missing data value is coded as "0"
